name: Black Diamond Ascension Skins - Unisex
description: Light skins that offer fast gliding and good grip on low-angle approaches. The nylon material makes the Ascension Skins supple and packable, so they suit hut trips and ambitious days when you expect to accumulate some vertical.Pre-installed tips and tails for ease-of-use.Protective mesh storage bag included for overnight, at home or over the summer to prevent glue breakdown.BD Gold Label glue is proven and reliable in all conditions and temperatures, and remains sticky season after season.Nice stiff laminate makes them easy to use in blowy conditions.STS adjustable tails provide 10cm of length adjustment.Trimmable to fit the ski's profile.
